ru.cos.sim.driver.composite
Class Perception

java.lang.Object
  ru.cos.sim.driver.composite.Perception

public class Perception
extends Object

Perception of the road object. Perception is essentially an Observation but treated in way like regular human does, i.e. observation contains distance between objects point positions, otherwise, perceptions treat distance between points with the knowledge about their lengths and widths.
Specifically, for longitudinal observations, percepts object will distract half of objects lengths to determine distance.

Author:
zroslaw
